search.name: Track Airborne Express Packages
search.description:
Track Airborne Express packages by tracking number (up to 25):
Example:
abex [tracking #1] [tracking #2]

form.name: abexf
form.COMMENT: The following field was active (i.e. had focus) when the search was generated.
